source_note: State baseline derived from Hawaii DOH Solid Waste Branch and county recycling programs; local rules vary by island.

organics.guidance: Composting and green waste recycling encouraged under DOH Solid Waste rules; many islands operate green waste drop-offs.
organics.bin: Green waste bin or compost drop-off site.
organics.notes: Oahu and Maui accept yard trimmings; food waste programs limited to commercial sectors.
provenance: City & County of Honolulu Recycling Division

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean, dry paper and cardboard; flatten boxes.
paper_cardboard.notes: Do not include waxed, greasy, or wet cardboard.

glass_containers.guidance: Recycle glass bottles and jars with HI-5 deposit symbol.
glass_containers.bin: Redemption center or curbside bin (varies by island).
glass_containers.notes: Non-HI-5 glass may go to local reuse or recycling drop-offs.

metal_containers.guidance: Recycle aluminum and steel cans; HI-5 aluminum beverage cans are redeemable.

plastics.guidance: Plastic bottles and containers with HI-5 label or #1/#2 accepted by island programs.
plastics.bin: Blue recycling bin or redemption center.
plastics.notes: Plastic bags, film, and foam are not accepted curbside.

beverage_containers_crv.guidance: Hawaii has a statewide HI-5 deposit program (5Â¢ refund per eligible container).
beverage_containers_crv.notes: Covers most glass, aluminum, and plastic drink containers under 68 oz.

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeable and lead-acid batteries through collection sites or HHW events.
household_batteries.bin: Drop-off at battery or HHW collection site.
household_batteries.notes: Keep batteries out of regular trash or blue bins.

e_waste.guidance: Manufacturers must offer recycling under the Hawaii Electronic Device Recycling and Recovery Law.
e_waste.bin: Take to approved e-waste collection sites.
e_waste.notes: Accepted devices include TVs, monitors, printers, and computers.

plastic_bags_and_film.guidance: All counties restrict or ban single-use plastic checkout bags.
plastic_bags_and_film.bin: Reusable or paper bags required; some retailers accept film drop-offs.
plastic_bags_and_film.notes: Plastic film is not recyclable curbside.
provenance: County bag ordinances (Oahu, Maui, Kauai, Hawaii County)

bulky_items.guidance: Bulky items require scheduled curbside pickup or landfill drop-off.
bulky_items.notes: Appointments required in most counties; fees may apply.
